fields.description: If enabled, the system will post accounting entries for inventory automatically.
fields.label: Make Accounting Entry For Every Stock Movement

fields.description: Accounting entry frozen up to this date, nobody can do / modify entry except role specified below.
fields.label: Accounts Frozen Upto

fields.description: Users with this role are allowed to create / modify accounting entry before frozen date
fields.label: Allowed Role to Edit Entries Before Frozen Date

fields.description: Users with this role are allowed to set frozen accounts and create / modify accounting entries against frozen accounts
fields.label: Frozen Accounts Modifier

fields.description: Role that is allowed to submit transactions that exceed credit limits set.
fields.label: Credit Controller
